name: Bladestorm (itch) (sixtenhugosson)
description:
Player: sighs Sixten? Do i really have to do this? Urgh... FINE! This is a game about me, of course. And throwing a sword to kill enemies and gain vertical height.

Sixten: Okay, that's enough...
Hi everybody! Thanks for even reading this!
This is a little demo of the game Bladestorm (WIP title)
I think that the "Player" explained the main mechanic in this demo.
Throwing your sword!

QUICK DISCLAIMER: This is a demo, meaning that it is very short. (About 5 - 10 minutes)

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Throw Sword: X

Jump: Z

Enter Door: Down Arrow

Pause: Escape
